content.description:
You will participate in a simulated exchange of text-chat messages and write an article. Type your response in the target language. 

Interpersonal Writing: Text Chat

You will participate in a simulated exchange of text-chat messages. Each time it is your turn to write, you will have 90 seconds to respond. You should respond as fully and as appropriately as possible.

You will have a conversation with Yuri Yamashita, an exchange student from Japan, about protecting the environment.
content.question:
Give your opinion.
リサイクルについて学校で発表するんですが、ポスターとビデオと、どちらを使った方がいいでしょうか。

frqParts.text:
Give your opinion.
リサイクルについて学校で発表するんですが、ポスターとビデオと、どちらを使った方がいいでしょうか。

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
